metadata.name: TRINITY
metadata.description:
TRINITY is a piece that’s dear to my heart.

In 2016, I decided to dig into my saving and book a trip to Egypt.
At that time, that would have been considered a “reckless” move.

Took 3 months unpaid leave and amidst the uncertainty 
booked my flight.
Looking back, I’m glad I did it because this trip was the genesis
of me chasing my wildest dream, PHOTOGRAPHY.

I’d seen a couple of photos of the Pyramids, and had the chance 
to tour inside but the photos I took didn’t quite work for me.
We hired horses to explore the desert with a friend
and voila, there it was…….. 
A perspective that tickled my fancy.  
A perspective of Numbers & Patterns.

THE JOURNEY TO FREEDOM


Your horse awaits.
Join me on my journey to the unknown.
